snippet.title: "Just How Do I Play Binaries Anyway?"
snippet.description:
Wondering how Binaries plays and what makes it unique? Well wonder no more, friend, as Tony talks you through a couple of levels.
Coming to Windows & Mac on Steam April 4th, PlayStation 4 & Xbox One later in 2016. http://www.PlayBinaries.com

Test your reflexes and awareness as you simultaneously guide two lovable balls through 101 brightly coloured challenges in the world's first concentration platformer. Control both at exactly the same time using the same set of controls and watch out for hazards. Oh, and there are jokes!
